content: --पद्मः {1} a particular high number. {2} <ab>N.</ab> of <ls>Nārada.</ls> {3} <ab>N.</ab> of one of the nine treasures of Kubera. {4} <ab>N.</ab> of the southernmost elephant supporting the world. {5} an epithet of Nanda. {6} a Kinnara attendant on Kubera. (--द्मं {1} a white lotus. {2} <ab>N.</ab> of a city.
